>From: "raccoon7679" >Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com >To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com >Subject: DeathSteel >Date: Thu, 06 Mar 2003 16:26:29 -0000 > >DeathSteel:: >He leaned against the back wall of the room and crossed his arms >infront of his chest. He nodded at KitKat's question as to when do >they do battle. He too wanted to fight. But not if he wasn't sure of >victory. One fights when one has the advantage. So far, unless the >maximals were a smaller number than they were, he didn't see an >obvious advantage over his nemesis. He waited for Hydras to make the >final decision. >

<DIV></DIV>>obvious advantage over his nemesis. He waited for Hydras to make the 
<DIV></DIV>>final decision.
